TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDictionary implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type IDictionary = interface interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Represents a nongeneric collection of key/value pairs.

span.span: Represents a nongeneric collection of key/value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口是键/值对的非泛型集合的基接口。The interface is the base interface for nongeneric collections of key/value pairs. 此接口的泛型版本，请参阅。For the generic version of this interface, see . 每个元素都是键/值对存储在对象。Each element is a key/value pair stored in a object. 每个对都必须有唯一键。Each pair must have a unique key. 实现可以改变是否允许为 null 的键。Implementations can vary in whether they allow the key to be null. 值可以为 null，并且不需要是唯一的。The value can be null and does not have to be unique. 接口允许对所包含的键和值进行枚举，但它并不表示任何特定的排序顺序。The interface allows the contained keys and values to be enumerated, but it does not imply any particular sort order. 实现分为三类： 只读的、 固定大小、 大小可变的。 implementations fall into three categories: read-only, fixed-size, variable-size. 一个只读的不能修改对象。A read-only object cannot be modified. 固定大小对象不允许添加或删除的元素，但允许修改现有元素。A fixed-size object does not allow the addition or removal of elements, but does allow the modification of existing elements. 可变大小对象允许添加、 删除和修改元素。A variable-size object allows the addition, removal, and modification of elements. `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 返回集合中的元素的类型的对象。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 由于每个元素的对象是一个键/值对，元素类型不是键的类型或值的类型。Since each element of the object is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反，元素类型是。Instead, the element type is . 例如：For example: [!code-cpp[Dictionary#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/cpp/remarks.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[Dictionary#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/CS/remarks.cs#14)] [!code-vb[Dictionary#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/VB/remarks.vb#14)] `foreach`语句是允许仅从读取但不是写入集合的枚举器周围的包装。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which allows only reading from but not writing to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何定义实现的简单的字典类接口。The following code example demonstrates how to define a simple dictionary class that implements the interface. [!code-cpp[Dictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/cpp/Dictionary.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Dictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/CS/Dictionary.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Dictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/VB/Dictionary.vb#1)]

span.para: 实现类必须具有对键进行比较的方法。
The implementing class must have a means to compare keys.

span.span: Adds an element with the provided key and value to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外可以使用字典中不存在要添加新元素的键的值设置属性 (例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`)。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary (for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`). 但是，如果在字典中已存在指定的键，则将设置属性将会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反，方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 实现可以改变是否允许键为`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow the key to be `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Dictionary#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/cpp/Dictionary.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[Dictionary#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/CS/Dictionary.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Dictionary#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/VB/Dictionary.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现可以改变是否允许键为`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow the key to be `null`. 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象并上的方法`item`来确定是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在.NET Framework 的早期版本中，通过进行此判断和方法的`item`参数在集合中的对象。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Dictionary#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/cpp/Dictionary.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Dictionary#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/CS/Dictionary.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Dictionary#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/VB/Dictionary.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: Returns an object for the object.

span.span: Returns an object for the object.
An object for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，使用`foreach`建议而不是直接操作枚举器。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义属性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean
public: property bool IsFixedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the object has a fixed size.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the object has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果对象具有固定大小; 否则为。

span.span: if the object has a fixed size; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允许添加或删除元素的集合创建，但允许修改现有元素后。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but does allow the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合只是一个集合与防止添加和移除元素; 的包装器因此，如果在更改基础集合，包括添加或删除的元素，大小固定集合反映了这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现属性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Dictionary#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/cpp/Dictionary.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[Dictionary#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/CS/Dictionary.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Dictionary#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/VB/Dictionary.vb#6)]

span.span: if the object is read-only; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现属性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Dictionary#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/cpp/Dictionary.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Dictionary#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/CS/Dictionary.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Dictionary#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/VB/Dictionary.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[key]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 此外可以使用字典中不存在要添加新元素的键的值设置属性 (例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`)。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary (for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`). 但是，如果在字典中已存在指定的键，则将设置属性将会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反，方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 实现可以改变是否允许键为`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow the key to be `null`. 使用 C# 语言`this`[这](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md)关键字来定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the `this`[this](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现属性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Dictionary#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/cpp/Dictionary.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[Dictionary#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/CS/Dictionary.cs#13)] [!code-vb[Dictionary#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/VB/Dictionary.vb#13)]
